pylapp.smoothclicker.android.misc

Class UIAutomatorEspressoTestStatusBarNotifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.AbstractTest
      • pylapp.smoothclicker.android.misc.UIAutomatorEspressoTestStatusBarNotifier

  • public class UIAutomatorEspressoTestStatusBarNotifier
extends AbstractTest
    Class to use to make UI tests with Espresso and UIAutomator of the NotificationsManager.
    Since:
    21/03/2016
    Version:
    1.1.0
    Author:
    pylapp
    See Also:
    AbstractTest

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void clean()
      Cleans The tests have make the device to its initial state
      void init()
      Initializes the NotificationManager The tests have to start on the home screen

      Test the makeNotification() method The notification features can handle removable (or not) notifications, with clicks on them and wrong inputs

      Test the removeNotification() method All notifications have to be removable
